data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watanabe, Kyohei, Sheng, Mao-Ling (2018): Taxonomic notes on Exetastes fukuchiyamanus Uchida, 1928 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Banchinae), with description of a new species from Japan and China. Zootaxa 4399 (2): 281-288, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.2.11|45 occurrences
